one_liner: The document discusses the interplay between macro and individual influences on mental health, emphasizing the role of workplace policies and socioeconomic status.
bullets: Workplace policies significantly affect mental health engagement.
Socioeconomic status influences access to mental health care.
Individual beliefs about mental health can hinder seeking help.
Health disparities arise from uneven distribution of resources and beliefs.
The Health Belief Model can guide the design of digital health interventions.
Digital tools can lower barriers and increase access to mental health support.
